Testing VPSUBW instruction
=========================
Test 1: 128-bit basic functionality
Input: 30000 -30000 15000 -15000 32767 -32768 0 1000 
Subtrahend: 1000 -1000 20000 -20000 1 -1 500 -500 
Result: 29000 -29000 -5000 5000 32766 -32767 -500 1500 
Expected: 29000 -29000 -5000 5000 32766 -32767 -500 1500 
[PASS]

Test 2: 128-bit memory operand
Input: 32767 -32768 0 1000 -1000 20000 -20000 500 
Subtrahend (mem): 1 -1 500 -500 30000 -30000 15000 -15000 
Result: 32766 -32767 -500 1500 -31000 -15536 30536 15500 
Expected: 32766 -32767 -500 1500 -31000 -15536 30536 15500 
[PASS]

Test 3: 256-bit AVX operation
Input: 30000 -30000 15000 -15000 32767 -32768 0 1000 -1000 20000 -20000 500 32767 -32768 0 1000 
Subtrahend: 1000 -1000 20000 -20000 1 -1 500 -500 30000 -30000 15000 -15000 1 -1 500 -500 
Result: 29000 -29000 -5000 5000 32766 -32767 -500 1500 -31000 -15536 30536 15500 32766 -32767 -500 1500 
Expected: 29000 -29000 -5000 5000 32766 -32767 -500 1500 -31000 -15536 30536 15500 32766 -32767 -500 1500 
[PASS]

VPSUBW tests PASSED
